author: .fjl
content: but can you go into detail? it converts on RPC?

author: __flcl
content: Nethermind will not convert by default(but can do so if a special flag is active) and will drop V0 txs from tx pool when head is Osaka. Conversion seems like a ddos vector a bit, does it work well on your side guys during transition when the pool contains lots of blob txs? We still can change the default behavior if it's hard to handle by blob users and is not big of concern in terms of ddos
